trans-unit.source: Represents the formatting and style information applied to individual cells within a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa as informações de formatação e o estilo aplicadas às células individuais dentro de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCellStyle class lets you share style information across multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> cells, rows, columns, and row or column headers, avoiding the memory requirements of setting style properties on individual cells.
trans-unit.target: A classe o DataGridViewCellStyle permite-lhe partilhar informações de estilo em múltiplas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>células, linhas, colunas e cabeçalhos de linha ou coluna, evitando os requisitos de memória da definição de propriedades de estilo em células individuais.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about classes that have a property of type DataGridViewCellStyle and how they relate to each other, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as classes que têm uma propriedade do tipo o DataGridViewCellStyle e como se relacionam entre si, consulte [estilos de célula no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> class using default property values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> classe utilizando valores de propriedade predefinidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> class using the property values of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> classe utilizando os valores de propriedade especificado dos <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> used as a template to provide initial property values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> utilizado como um modelo para fornecer valores de propriedade inicial.

trans-unit.source: dataGridViewCellStyle is .
trans-unit.target: dataGridViewCellStyleis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the position of the cell content within a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a posição da célula conteúdo dentro de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> célula.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The property value is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade não é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> para atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyStyle method applies the values of the properties that are set in the `dataGridViewCellStyle` parameter to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyStyle aplica-se os valores das propriedades que são definidas no `dataGridViewCellStyle` parâmetro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> atual

trans-unit.source: If a property is not set in `dataGridViewCellStyle`, the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> retains its value of that property.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade não está definida na `dataGridViewCellStyle`, atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>retém o valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to apply to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> para aplicar a atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: dataGridViewCellStyle is .
trans-unit.target: dataGridViewCellStyleis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de fundo de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of a cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor de fundo de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents an exact copy of this cell style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa uma cópia exata deste estilo de célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value saved to the data source when the user enters a null value into a cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor guardado para a origem de dados quando o utilizador introduz um valor nulo numa célula.

trans-unit.source: The user can enter a null value into a cell by pressing CTRL+0 or by typing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador pode introduzir um valor nulo numa célula ao premir CTRL +&0; ou ao escrever o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user commits the change, the underlying cell value is set to the value of the DataSourceNullValue property or to `null` if DataSourceNullValue is <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> and the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> is a reference type.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador consolida a alteração, o valor de célula subjacente é definido para o valor da propriedade DataSourceNullValue ou a `null` se DataSourceNullValue <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>e célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>é um tipo de referência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This conversion does not occur when you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Esta conversão não ocorre quando definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade através de programação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The control does not display the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property value for cell values equal to the DataSourceNullValue property value when DataSourceNullValue is set to a value other than <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> or `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O controlo não apresentar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>valor da propriedade para os valores de célula igual ao valor de propriedade DataSourceNullValue quando DataSourceNullValue está definido como um valor diferente de <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>ou `null`.</xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event to display the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, pode processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>o evento a apresentar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the code example in this topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o exemplo de código neste tópico.

trans-unit.source: The value saved to the data source when the user specifies a null cell value.
trans-unit.target: O valor guardado para a origem de dados quando o utilizador Especifica um valor de célula nulo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether this instance is equivalent to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se esta instância é equivalente ao objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: An object to compare with this instance, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto para a comparação com esta instância, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: if o is a and has the same property values as this instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se o é um e tem os mesmos valores de propriedade que esta instância; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font applied to the textual content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de letra aplicado para o conteúdo textual de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> célula.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to change the typeface styles applied to the cell text.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para alterar os estilos de tipo de carácter aplicados para o texto da célula.

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Drawing.Font> is immutable (its properties are read-only), you can modify this property only by assigning a new or existing <xref:System.Drawing.Font> to it; you cannot alter the properties of the returned object directly.
trans-unit.target: Porque um <xref:System.Drawing.Font>é imutável (as respetivas propriedades são só de leitura), pode modificar esta propriedade apenas atribuindo um novo ou existente <xref:System.Drawing.Font>ao mesmo; não é possível alterar as propriedades do objeto devolvido diretamente.</xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> applied to the cell text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> aplicado para o texto da célula.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de primeiro plano de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> célula.

trans-unit.source: The ForeColor property typically should specify a color that contrasts with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ForeColor, normalmente, deve especificar uma cor que contrasta com a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the foreground color of a cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor de primeiro plano de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format string applied to the textual content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cadeia de formato aplicada ao conteúdo textual de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> célula.

trans-unit.source: The Format property specifies how cell values are formatted as strings.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de formato Especifica a forma como os valores de célula estejam formatados como cadeias.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the format of the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que indica o formato do valor de célula.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object used to provide culture-specific formatting of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> cell values.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objecto utilizado para fornecer a formatação específicas do idioma do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> valores da célula.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IFormatProvider> used for cell formatting.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IFormatProvider>utilizada para formatação de célula.</xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture*>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture*>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture*>

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: Funciona como uma função de hash para um tipo específico.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash para o atual <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue*> property has been set.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue*>propriedade foi definida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue*>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> property has been explicitly set without having to store its default value for comparison.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para determinar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>propriedade foi definida explicitamente sem ter de armazenar o respetivo valor predefinido para comparação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> property has a non-empty default value, unlike most other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> properties, which have default values such as `null`, <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil porque o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>propriedade tem um valor predefinido não vazio, ao contrário da maioria das outras <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>Propriedades, que têm valores predefinidos, tais como `null`, <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue*> property is the default value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue*>propriedade é o valor predefinido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider*> property has been set.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider*>propriedade foi definida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider*>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property has been explicitly set without having to store its default value for comparison.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para determinar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>propriedade foi definida explicitamente sem ter de armazenar o respetivo valor predefinido para comparação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property has a non-empty default value, unlike most other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> properties, which have default values such as `null`, <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil porque o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>propriedade tem um valor predefinido não vazio, ao contrário da maioria das outras <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>Propriedades, que têm valores predefinidos, tais como `null`, <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider*> property is the default value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider*>propriedade é o valor predefinido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue*> property has been set.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue*>propriedade foi definida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue*>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property has been explicitly set without having to store its default value for comparison.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para determinar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>propriedade foi definida explicitamente sem ter de armazenar o respetivo valor predefinido para comparação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property has a non-empty default value, unlike most other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> properties, which have default values such as `null`, <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil porque o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>propriedade tem um valor predefinido não vazio, ao contrário da maioria das outras <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>Propriedades, que têm valores predefinidos, tais como `null`, <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue*> property is the default value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue*>propriedade é o valor predefinido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> cell display value corresponding to a cell value of <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> correspondente a um valor de célula de valor de apresentação de célula <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"> </xref> ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> cell with this cell style has a value of <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> or `null` or the user edits the cell and presses CTRL+0, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays the NullValue property value.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>célula com este estilo de célula tem um valor de <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>ou `null` ou o utilizador edita a célula e premir CTRL +&0;, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo apresenta o valor da propriedade NullValue.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When a user edits a cell with this cell style and enters the value of this property or presses CTRL+0, the control sets the cell value to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> property or to `null` if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> is <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> and the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> is a reference type.
trans-unit.target: Quando um utilizador edita uma célula com este estilo de célula e introduz o valor desta propriedade ou premir CTRL +&0;, o controlo define o valor de célula para o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>propriedade ou `null` se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>é <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>e célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>é um tipo de referência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This conversion does not occur when you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Esta conversão não ocorre quando definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade através de programação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The control does not display the NullValue property value for cell values equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> property value when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> is set to a value other than <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> or `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O controlo não apresentar o valor da propriedade NullValue para os valores de célula iguais a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>valor de propriedade quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>está definido para um valor diferente de <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>ou `null`.</xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event to display the NullValue property value.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, pode processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>o evento a apresentar o valor da propriedade NullValue.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the code example in this topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o exemplo de código neste tópico.

trans-unit.source: This property takes any object, which enables you to specify a value with a type appropriate to the display type of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade aceita qualquer objeto, que permite-lhe especificar um valor com um tipo apropriado para o tipo de visualização da célula.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set this property to string values for use by text box cells or images for use by image cells.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode definir esta propriedade para valores de cadeia para utilização por células de caixa de texto ou de imagens para utilização por células de imagem.

trans-unit.source: The object used to indicate a null value in a cell.
trans-unit.target: O objecto utilizado para indicar um valor nulo numa célula.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between the edge of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> and its content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o espaço entre o limite de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> e o respetivo conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Setting the Padding property affects where the editing control of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Definir a propriedade Padding afeta onde o controlo de edição a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>é desenhada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set Padding on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding?displayProperty=fullName> that has a value of 10 for its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> properties, the content of the cell is drawn in the middle of the cell with a space of 10 pixels between the edges of the text box and the edges of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se definir o preenchimento num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding?displayProperty=fullName>que tem um valor de 10 para o respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>Propriedades, o conteúdo da célula é desenhado meio de célula com um espaço de 10 pixels, entre as extremidades da caixa de texto e as margens da célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the space between the edge of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> and its content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> que representa o espaço entre o limite de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> e o respetivo conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color used by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> cell when it is selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de fundo utilizada por um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> células quando estiver selecionada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of a selected cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor de fundo de uma célula selecionada.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color used by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> cell when it is selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de primeiro plano utilizada por um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> células quando estiver selecionada.

trans-unit.source: The SelectionForeColor property typically should specify a color that contrasts with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SelectionForeColor, normalmente, deve especificar uma cor que contrasta com a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the foreground color of a selected cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor de primeiro plano de uma célula selecionada.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.ICloneable>interface.</xref:System.ICloneable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents an exact copy of this cell style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa uma cópia exata deste estilo de célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains additional data related to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que contém dados adicionais relacionados com o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains additional data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que contém dados adicionais.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string indicating the current property settings of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que indica as definições de propriedade atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string indicating the current property settings of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que indica as definições de propriedade atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether textual content in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> cell is wrapped to subsequent lines or truncated when it is too long to fit on a single line.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se textual conteúdo um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> célula é moldada para linhas subsequentes ou truncada quando é demasiado longa para caber numa única linha.

trans-unit.source: If WrapMode is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> for a cell that contains text, the cell displays the text on a single line, and displays any embedded newline characters as box characters.
trans-unit.target: Se for WrapMode <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>para uma célula que contém texto, a célula mostra o texto numa única linha e quaisquer carateres de nova linha incorporados como carateres de caixa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: If WrapMode is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> for a cell that contains text, the cell displays newline characters as line breaks, but also wraps any lines that exceed the width of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Se for WrapMode <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>para uma célula que contém texto, a célula apresenta carateres de nova linha como quebras de linha, mas também encapsula num wrapper quaisquer linhas que excedem a largura da célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The property value is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade não é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState"> </xref> valor.
